description: Rice flakes and spiced potatoes make up hearty poha, a popular Indian breakfast dish.
keywords: Vegetable dishes,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Potato,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Poha Potato Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 600g potatoes, peeled and chopped into cubes
0.5 medium red onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Place the potatoes in a large pan of boiling water and cook for 10 minutes and drain well. Soak the rice flakes in a bowl of water for 2 minutes and drain well.

Heat the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and heat the mustard seeds until they begin to pop. Add the curry leaves, cumin, chillis and asafoetida and tip in the potatoes and onion. Cook for 3-4 minutes.
Tip in the rice flakes and sugar and cook for 3-4 minutes, stirring well throughout. Serve with fresh coriander on top and lime wedges on the side.
